Header: New 681 Brigade Commander Takes Over Duties
Content: Colonel C.S Munasinghe of Sri Lanka Artillery on Monday (16) assumed duties as the Officiating 681 Brigade Commander of the 68 Division under the Security Force Headquarters - Mullaittivu. The newly-appointed Officiating Brigade Commander on arrival at the 681 Brigade premises at Mullivaikkal, Mullaittivu was greeted to a Guard Turnout at the entrance in accordance with military formalities. Commanding Officers and Staff Officers serving the 681 Brigade were present during the occasion.
